Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Hamartoma/Hamartomatous Polyp,/NCIThesaurus/Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Polyp/Hamartomatous Polyp
Record.Description: A polyp characterized by an overgrowth of mature cells and tissues that normally occur in the affected area.
